titles.title: Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Passed House without amendment. Names individuals to fill four of the six minority party employee positions pursuant to the Legislative Pay Act of 1929. Authorizes the minority leader to appoint and set the annual rate of pay for up to three minority employees in addition to the six already authorized.
